sentence.Network_en: I laughed my head off when I heard of his discomfiture.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到别人说起他的狼狈相,我放声大笑.

sentence.Network_en: Without experiencing discomfiture and setbacks, one can never find truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 不经过失败和挫折, 便找不到真理.

sentence.Network_en: He may laugh at our discomfiture now, but before long he'll be laughing on the other side of his face.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在可以对我们幸灾乐祸, 但是要不了多久他就会转喜为忧.

entry.def: Discomfiture is a feeling of slight embarrassment or confusion.

auth_sentence.content: Sad tidings...Of loss, of slaughter, and discomfiture.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sad tidings...Of loss, of slaughter, and discomfiture.

auth_sentence.content: Those who enjoy your discomfiture will gather like crows around a carcase.

auth_sentence.content: The discomfiture Fiddlingchild would certainly suffer when he found out exactly what...Anna was feeling.
